DOC.brief_summary: This single-center , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , sequential , multiple-dose study . The study conduct two part : Part A ( 6 cohort healthy adult receive even dose ) Part B ( one cohort elderly adult receive even dose ) .
DOC.brief_title: 2-Part Multiple Ascending Dose Study Safety Pharmacokinetics Healthy Elderly Subjects
DOC.criteria: Included : Healthy male female , age 18 55 year ( Part A ) 65 80 year ( Part B ) Who report typical time bed 7.5 9 hour Who report typical bedtime 22:00 24:00 typical wake time 06:00 08:00 Who report typical sleep latency < = 30 minute All female must nonchildbearing potential , subject sterilize surgically otherwise proven sterile . Females must negative serum betahuman chorionic gonadotropin ( BetahCG ) test result Screening negative urine pregnancy test Baseline . Body mass index BMI > 18 32 kg/m2 Screening Excluded : Performed shift work within 2 week prior Screening Had take flight across three time zone 7 day prior Screening Female subject nurse With history gastrointestinal surgery ( hepatectomy , nephrectomy , digestive organ resection , etc . ) may affect PK profile E2006 With known history clinically significant drug food allergy presently experience significant seasonal allergy Hypersensitivity study drug excipients
